title: Evaporative Canister (if fitted) - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
EVAP Canister Install D34; DD2; DD4; DE; DE2; DF; DF2
Position the evaporative canister to the motorcycle and connect the two hoses to the left hand side of the evaporative canister as noted for removal.
Fit the evaporative canister to the motorcycle, ensure the locating lug on the left hand side locates into its hole in the airbox grommet.
Align the right hand side to the air box, fit the fixings and tighten to
